title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 June 16 MO [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Monday, 16 June 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: Alex covers the deteriorating situation in Iraq on this Monday, June 16 edition of The Alex Jones Show. 

Alex talks about the false flag unfolding in the Middle East as the U.S. embassy in Iraq is evacuated and another town falls to radical and murderous jihadist terrorists created by the CIA and the Saudis and who have captured a large swath of the country over the last week. 

The Infowars crew reports from South Texas on the immigration situation as DHS detainment facilities are flooded with illegals and church groups welcome them with open arms. 

On today's broadcast Alex talks with radio host, author and retired orthopedic surgeon Stan Monteith about the situation in Iraq. Dr. Monteith is the author of Iraq: The Untold Story. 

Alex also talks with Bruce Fein, a lawyer who specializes in constitutional and international law. Fein served as an associate deputy attorney general from 1981 to 1982 and as general counsel to the Federal Communications Commission during the Reagan administration. He talks with Alex about an article he wrote defending Kentucky Senator Rand Paul's foreign policy against an onslaught by the liberal establishment as it promotes "objectless wars that promise to culminate in self-ruination."

 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
